question: The term “Aggregate Measurement of Support (AMS)”, sometimes seen in news, is related to:
explanation: WTO’s Agreement on Agriculture (AoA) classifies domestic support or subsidies given by the government to farmers into three different categories viz. Green box, Blue box and Amber box. Among these, the most trade-distorting form of farm subsidies known in WTO parlance is Aggregate Measurement of Support (AMS) or “Amber Box”. The AMS means annual level of support (subsidies) expressed in monetary terms.
